sentence.text: The presynaptic cytomatrix protein Piccolo, encoded by cytoskeleton organization, is frequently mutated and amplified in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma (ESCC), but its exact roles in ESCC remain unclear.
These results demonstrate that Piccolo contributes to tumor aggressiveness in ESCC, likely by stabilizing positive regulation of protein phosphorylation and promoting EGFR-dependent signaling.
